thread.title: Experience the crazy life of Lionel Messi through HIS eyes as Barcelona superstar tries to leave the Camp Nou
thread.title_full: Experience the crazy life of Lionel Messi through HIS eyes as Barcelona superstar tries to leave the Camp Nou

author: Jake Polden
title: Experience the crazy life of Lionel Messi through HIS eyes as Barcelona superstar tries to leave the Camp Nou
text:
Experience the crazy life of Lionel Messi through HIS eyes as Barcelona superstar tries to leave the Camp Nou Messi's fiancee Antonella Roccuzzo captured footage of the Argentine's fans swarming his car to take pictures Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now This is what it's like to be Lionel Messi leaving Camp Nou Share this video Get FC Barcelona     
Commuting can be stressfull. 
There is traffic on the road, train delays, the list goes on and on. 
But we don't think we've ever had a commute quite as wild as Lionel Messi's average journey home from the Camp Nou. 
The above video was captured by the Barcelona star's fiancee Antonella Roccuzzo as the pair attempted to leave the famous Catalan ground. 
Sitting in the passenger seat, the 28-year-old films the crowds of people swarming Messi's car while attempting to snap photos of him. Bit of traffic on the way home Just another day in the life of Lionel Messi 
Security personnel try their best to clear the road ahead of the vehicle, but they are more than outnumbered by the groups of excited supporters. 
While some are willing to take pictures from a distance, others want to get as close to the car as physically possible. 
Some even attempt to get inside the car - at least with their hands - in order to snap selfies with one of the world's greatest footballers. This is getting silly now 
Slowly but surely Messi, who continues to trickle forward, eventually appears to clear the majority of the crowd before heading home. 
Same time tomorrow everyone...
